mechanisms.name: Strategy Description
mechanisms.definition: Description of the legal strategy or course of action under consideration.

mechanisms.name: Trade-off Articulation
mechanisms.definition: Factors that made the strategy more or less suitable; pros and cons.

mechanisms.name: Constraint Recognition
mechanisms.definition: Legal, procedural, practical, or resource constraints affecting the strategy.

mechanisms.name: Uncertainty Acknowledgment
mechanisms.definition: What was uncertain or unknown at that stage regarding the strategy.

mechanisms.name: Rejected Alternative Strategy
mechanisms.definition: Other legal strategies considered but not pursued.

mechanisms.name: Priority Declaration
mechanisms.definition: Priority or relative importance of factors (priority marker statements).

mechanisms.name: Conditional Strategy Logic
mechanisms.definition: If/then logic or contingent action based on conditions or uncertainty.

mechanisms.name: Information Basis Reference
mechanisms.definition: Reference to cited information or source grounding a statement.
